content: Hello friends! I have a rust program in Fuchsias tools that is now taking >=16gb of ram during compilation. I'd like to do some memory profiling to see where to focus efforts. I found a blog post about CPU profiling rustc, is there something similar for memory profiling?
I've used heaptrack on rustdoc in the past, but it doesn't work with jemalloc enabled, which I think it is for nightly builds. So you'd have to build rustc from source
